item.title: About
item.author: elsharifabdallah53@gmail.com (Abdallah Mohamed)
item.description: About me My name is Abdallah Mohamed, studing computer science as a self study I’m generally interested in cybersecurity, specificaly in offensive part Also i really like to read/develop security tools. Sec tools i developed WRock is a multi web security purposes tool hellMaker is a backdoors generator with advanced evasions PowerLoad3r is a malicious powershell scripts loader designed to avoid detection and a lot more, you can check out my github.
